2.text: Beautiful isn't it. Things here often take on an extra ethereal quality to them.

3.text: It just doesn't feel real to me.

5.text: I still don't understand who you are... or why you shape shift.

7.text: Let's just say my existence isn't exactly literal. But I'm here to help, so you have to start trusting me.

8.text: So you want to stay ignorant. Huh.. Not what I expected from you, kid. But I aint arguing. Let's get going.
